mapper.sql: id as id , createDate as createDate , status as status , creator as creator , lastModDate as lastModDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , code as code , name as name , subjection as subjection , educationLevel as educationLevel , property as property , type as type , url as url , address as address , contactPhone as contactPhone , entranceIntro as entranceIntro , universityIntro as universityIntro , provinceId as provinceId , provinceName as provinceName , cityId as cityId , cityName as cityName , countyId as countyId , countyName as countyName , batchType as batchType
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_university ( createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, code, name, subjection, educationLevel, property, type, url, address, contactPhone, entranceIntro, universityIntro, provinceId, provinceName, cityId, cityName, countyId, countyName, batchType ) VALUES ( #{createDate}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{code}, #{name}, #{subjection}, #{educationLevel}, #{property}, #{type}, #{url}, #{address}, #{contactPhone}, #{entranceIntro}, #{universityIntro}, #{provinceId}, #{provinceName}, #{cityId}, #{cityName}, #{countyId}, #{countyName}, #{batchType} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE gk_university
createDate = #{createDate},
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
code = #{code},
name = #{name},
subjection = #{subjection},
educationLevel = #{educationLevel},
property = #{property},
type = #{type},
url = #{url},
address = #{address},
contactPhone = #{contactPhone},
entranceIntro = #{entranceIntro},
universityIntro = #{universityIntro},
provinceId = #{provinceId},
provinceName = #{provinceName},
cityId = #{cityId},
cityName = #{cityName},
countyId = #{countyId},
countyName = #{countyName},
batchType = #{batchType},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE gk_university
createDate = #{map.createDate},
status = #{map.status},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
code = #{map.code},
name = #{map.name},
subjection = #{map.subjection},
educationLevel = #{map.educationLevel},
property = #{map.property},
type = #{map.type},
url = #{map.url},
address = #{map.address},
contactPhone = #{map.contactPhone},
entranceIntro = #{map.entranceIntro},
universityIntro = #{map.universityIntro},
provinceId = #{map.provinceId},
provinceName = #{map.provinceName},
cityId = #{map.cityId},
cityName = #{map.cityName},
countyId = #{map.countyId},
countyName = #{map.countyName},
batchType = #{map.batchType},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gk_university ( createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, code, name, subjection, educationLevel, property, type, url, address, contactPhone, entranceIntro, universityIntro, provinceId, provinceName, cityId, cityName, countyId, countyName, batchType ) VALUES ( #{map.createDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.code}, #{map.name}, #{map.subjection}, #{map.educationLevel}, #{map.property}, #{map.type}, #{map.url}, #{map.address}, #{map.contactPhone}, #{map.entranceIntro}, #{map.universityIntro}, #{map.provinceId}, #{map.provinceName}, #{map.cityId}, #{map.cityName}, #{map.countyId}, #{map.countyName}, #{map.batchType} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_university
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND code like CONCAT('%', #{condition.code} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{condition.name} , '%')
AND subjection like CONCAT('%', #{condition.subjection} , '%')
AND educationLevel like CONCAT('%', #{condition.educationLevel} , '%')
AND property like CONCAT('%', #{condition.property} , '%')
AND type like CONCAT('%', #{condition.type} , '%')
AND url like CONCAT('%', #{condition.url} , '%')
AND address like CONCAT('%', #{condition.address} , '%')
AND contactPhone like CONCAT('%', #{condition.contactPhone} , '%')
AND entranceIntro like CONCAT('%', #{condition.entranceIntro} , '%')
AND universityIntro like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityIntro} , '%')
AND provinceId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.provinceId} , '%')
AND provinceName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.provinceName} , '%')
AND cityId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.cityId} , '%')
AND cityName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.cityName} , '%')
AND countyId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.countyId} , '%')
AND countyName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.countyName} , '%')
AND batchType like CONCAT('%', #{condition.batchType} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
